title: 772: BITCOIN STILL HASN’T SEEN BIG ‘CRESCENDO’ SUPER BULL MARKET TOP, SAYS CRYPTO VETERAN BOBBY LEE!!
description:
Bobby Lee thinks Bitcoin still has a long way to go before reaching a peak this cycle.

"I think there’s a good chance we’ll hit the peak either later this year or maybe early next year. But I think we’re still on for December. We’ll see a rally coming up. And when we do hit the peak, it’s going to go very fast and easily surpass $150,000 to $200,000.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

itunes:author: Justin Verrengia
itunes:subtitle: Crypto veteran Bobby Lee thinks Bitcoin (BTC) still has a long way to go before reaching a peak this cycle, even after tumbling sharply from its new all-time high above $69,000 earlier this month. "I think there’s a good chance we’ll hit the peak...
